0.text: Innate - Scarecrow Effigy: Fiddlesticks begins the game with an exclusive  Scarecrow Effigy, which permanently occupies the trinket slot. Fiddlesticks can pretend to be an Effigy by standing still and not acting nor being acted upon for 2 seconds, during which it adjusts its body into a scarecrow and extends its arm out to expose its lantern.

1.text: Innate - A Harmless Scarecrow: From level 6 onward, placing an  Effigy also summons a demonic eyeball at the location that grants  obscured vision of enemy units that are not  visible in the area for 6 seconds while also  revealing and  disabling enemy  wards and  stealthed traps.

0.text: Passive: While Fiddlesticks has been out of combat for at least 2.5 seconds and is not  visible to the enemy team, or is pretending to be an  Effigy, Fiddlesticks' next damaging ability causes all targets struck to  flee for a duration.

1.text: Targets feared by Fiddlesticks are placed on a cooldown equal to Terrify's cooldown, during which they cannot be feared by it again.

2.text: Active: Fiddlesticks screeches at the target enemy, dealing magic damage and causing them to  flee for a duration. This has a minimum damage threshold and is capped at 400 against  monsters.

origin: 6 / 7 / 8 / 9 / 10% (+ 2% per 100 ap) of target's current health

3.text: Against targets with a cooldown, Terrify instead will have its  damage and minimum threshold doubled.

origin: 12 / 14 / 16 / 18 / 20% (+ 4% per 100 ap) of target's current health

4.text: Minions are always feared if Fiddlesticks is not attacking them and there is no enemy champion in its view.

0.text: Active: Fiddlesticks forms a  tether between itself and each nearby enemy over the cast time, then  channels for up to 2 seconds, harvesting the souls of tethered targets,  revealing itself in the process.

1.text: While Fiddlesticks is channeling, tethered enemies are  revealed and dealt magic damage every 0.25 seconds, with the last tick dealing additional magic damage. Total damage is reduced to 50% against  minions.

2.text: Fiddlesticks  heals itself for a percentage of the pre-mitigation damage dealt, reduced to 15% against minions.

3.text: Bountiful Harvest ends if all targets have died or broken their tethers. If the channel was not interrupted, 60% of the remaining  cooldown is refunded.

4.text: A nearby enemy is required to cast this ability. Fiddlesticks does not need  sight of a target to tether itself to them.

0.text: Active: Fiddlesticks slashes the target location with its scythe, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area and  slowing them for 1.25 seconds.

1.text: Enemies hit in the center of the area are also  silenced for 1.25 seconds.

0.text: Active: Fiddlesticks  channels for 1.5 seconds, then  blinks to the target location upon completion with a murder of crows flying wildly around it for 5 seconds, dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies.

1.concerningText: Passive: While Fiddlesticks has been out of combat for at least 2.5 seconds and is not  visible to the enemy team, or is pretending to be an  Effigy, Fiddlesticks' next damaging ability causes all targets struck to  flee for a duration.

+18 magic penetration

1.originHTML: +  800

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • boots
  • sorcs

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Chilling Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Chilling Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all item effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • jungle

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • red

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Places a visible Control Ward at the target location (600 range), which grants sight over the surrounding 900 units. Cannot have its sight disabled. Its sight also:
  • Reveals and disables enemy wards.
  • Reveals enemy stealthed traps.
  • Reveals Camouflaged champions.

It is also exposed to enemies while it is revealing one of the above stealthed units, or granting vision of a Tentacle.
consume.originText:

Reveals and  disables enemy wards.
Reveals enemy  stealthed traps.
Reveals  Camouflaged champions.

It is also  exposed to enemies while it is revealing one of the above stealthed units, or granting vision of a  Tentacle.

+90 ability power
+15 ability haste
+250 health
+6 magic penetration

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Supersonic: Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while moving towards nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
active.originText:
UNIQUE – SUPERSONIC:  Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while moving towards nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
passive.originText: MYTHIC PASSIVE: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.

Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).
